rashdir wrote:

> Hi,
> 
> Can someone tell me what's wrong here?
> 
> c:\>C:\j2sdk1.4.2_01\jre\bin\java.exe -classpath c:\proj\src\
> staging\classes;c:\proj\3rd\junit\junit.jar; junit.swingui.TestRunner
> a/b/c/ATest
> 
> This works fine. In the above command if I change swingui to textui,
> I get "Class not found a/b/c/ATest .

Please use class notation and not directory notation. Example: a.b.c.ATest.

I believe this is in the FAQ. Google "JUnit FAQ" for future reference.
